description: 20 pages, saddle-stapled; white paper covers; small black and white newsletter publication with 'The Artpolice' lettering and words 'authorative easy to use' at UL;  magnifying glass with 2 faces at UR; image at bottom of Christ-like figure smoking a cigarette and holding a dager in his PR hand; same as A49 except for color
title: Artpolice, Vol. 15. No.1
